.. toctree::

   source/Py_Admittance.rst

Py_Admittance
================================

Py_Admittance is a simple code that allows computing the global observed and theoretical admittance functions and their spatio-spectrally localized versions. 

The model uses the equations provided in `Broquet & Wieczorek (2019) <https://agupubs.onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/abs/10.1029/2019JE005959>`_. An example shows how the `Displacement_strain_planet (DSP) <https://github.com/AB-Ares/Displacement_strain_planet>`_ package can be used to achieve the same results. The DSP package can be used to add complexity to the loading model and considers tangential loads.

.. image:: ../misc/Front.png
   :width: 2000
